message: Reminder: You are registered for Free Law: Resources, Technology & Legal Issues (Past, Present & Future) on Friday, January 26, 2024 at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT.
You can use this link to join us.
If you have trouble, please contact Justia Support for assistance.
message3: Please note: This presentation is accredited for one hour of General CLE credit in California. It has been submitted to the State Bar of Texas Committee on MCLE and is pending review.
If you want to earn CLE credit for your attendance at this webinar, you will need to upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to take advantage of this exclusive benefit.

message: Legal research is a core part of your practice, but why should it have to cost you? Free legal resources are a great way to get the information you need with no additional cost, and we’re here to guide you through how to find the best ones.

You’re invited to join our CEO Tim Stanley as he discusses the best places to find free law resources that can help you in your practice, as well as the legal issues in the free law space, including copyright, privacy, and public access. Free Law: Resources, Technology & Legal Issues (Past, Present & Future) begins promptly at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT on Friday, January 26, 2024.
bottomline: Seats are limited, so reserve yours today!
message3: Please note: This presentation is accredited for one hour of General CLE credit in California. It has been submitted to the State Bar of Texas Committee on MCLE and is pending review.
If you want to earn CLE credit for your attendance at this webinar, you will need to upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to take advantage of this exclusive benefit.

message: Want to better understand how free legal resources can help you in your practice? On Friday, we are hosting an exclusive webinar to give you the scoop on what the best free law resources are and how the free law movement came to be. You don’t want to miss this!
You are invited to join our CEO Tim Stanley for Free Law: Resources, Technology & Legal Issues (Past, Present & Future) at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT on Friday, January 26, 2024.
message3: Please note: This presentation is accredited for one hour of General CLE credit in California. It has been submitted to the State Bar of Texas Committee on MCLE and is pending review.

message: Hi Name,

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! You must complete your attendance verification to receive CLE credit. As a reminder, if you have a free Justia Connect membership, you must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive CLE credit.
The steps below must be completed by 12:00 p.m. PT on Sunday, January 28, 2024 to receive credit.
Completing Your Attendance Verification
number-list: Input the attendance verification code received during your presentation.
Follow the remaining prompts in the form to input all pertinent information and offer evaluation of the CLE presentation.
Download your certificate, and you’re done!
message2: If you have any questions about verification, please contact Justia Support.

message: Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation, Free Law: Resources, Technology & Legal Issues. We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.
As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.
Do you have an idea for a future speaker or topic? Let us know!
